abstract: The social networking site will tap its roster of millions of users for mobilization in times of blood shortages.
snippet: The social networking site will tap its roster of millions of users for mobilization in times of blood shortages.
lead_paragraph: Facebook, the vast and expanding social networking Web site, is about to confront users with a serious new question: What’s your blood type?

headline.main: Facebook Is Extending Its Network to Blood Donations
headline.print_headline: Facebook Is Extending Its Network to Blood Donations
